dict.acceptation: 步行；步态；人行道；步行的路径；
行走；陪伴…走；徒步旅行；不翼而飞；

sent.orig: There is a simple beauty in ship, shop, walk, free, earth, mate, man, fried.
If you wanna walk fast, walk alone. And if you wanna walk far, walk with others.
sent.trans: 如果你想走得快，那么你就一个人走；如果你想走得远，那么就一起走。——非洲谚语。

sent.orig: Problem Set3: Asymptotics of percentile order statistics, non-reversing random walk, self-trapping random walk, self-avoiding random walk.
sent.trans: 问题3：有序统计百分数的近似、可逆随机漫步、已诱捕随机漫步、已避免随机漫步。

sent.orig: Problem Set 3: Asymptotics percentile order statistics, non-reversing random walk, self-trapping random walk, self-avoiding random walk.
sent.trans: 问题3：有序统计百分数的近似、非可逆随机漫步、自已诱捕随机漫步、自已避免随机漫步。

sent.orig: In the morning you go for a walk, and you test your reactions to that walk.
sent.trans: 在早上你出去散步，你测验你对散步的反应。
